name: ts-hybrid-boilerplate
description: Another boilerplate for ts projects, especifically to ts npm packages

scripts.build:commonjs: rm -fr cjs/* && tsc -p tsconfig-cjs.json && bash cjs-formatter.sh
scripts.build:test: rm -fr test/* && tsc -p tsconfig-test.json && bash cjs-formatter.sh
scripts.build:mjs: rm -fr mjs/* && tsc -p tsconfig.json && bash mjs-formatter.sh
scripts.build: npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:mjs && ./fixup.sh
